articles.author: JOHN O'CONNOR and COLLEEN SLEVIN
articles.description: SPRINGFIELD, Ill. (AP) — Authorities say five people were killed and five were seriously injured after a truck overturned in central Illinois, causing a toxic substance to leak from its cargo. Effingham County Coroner Kim Rhodes said the five dead included three from the same family — one adult and two children under 12.
articles.title: A truck crash in Illinois kills 5, seriously injures 5 and forces an evacuation due to ammonia leak

articles.author: LISA MASCARO, KEVIN FREKING and STEPHEN GROVES
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — On the brink of a federal government shutdown, the House on Saturday swiftly approved a 45-day funding bill to keep federal agencies open as Speaker Kevin McCarthy dropped demands for steep spending cuts and relied on Democratic votes for passage to send the package to the Senate.
articles.title: On the brink of a federal shutdown, the House passes a 45-day funding plan and sends it to Senate

articles.author: JOSH BOAK and CHRIS MEGERIAN
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Staring down a possible government shutdown, the White House wants to make sure any blame would fall at the other end of Pennsylvania Avenue — specifically on House Republicans.
articles.title: Biden says a possible shutdown wouldn't be his fault. Would Americans agree with him?

articles.author: JOHN O'CONNOR and COLLEEN SLEVIN
articles.description: SPRINGFIELD, Ill. (AP) — Authorities say five people were killed and five were seriously injured after a truck overturned in central Illinois, causing a toxic substance to leak from its cargo. Effingham County Coroner Kim Rhodes said the five dead included three from the same family — one adult and two children under 12.
articles.title: A truck crash in Illinois kills 5, seriously injures 5 and forces an evacuation due to ammonia leak

articles.author: MARY CLARE JALONICK
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — When Washington Sen. Patty Murray received a call early Friday morning that Sen.
articles.title: The Dianne Feinstein they knew: Women of the Senate remember a tireless fighter and a true friend

articles.author: RIO YAMAT and KEN RITTER
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — The first arrest in the 1996 slaying of Tupac Shakur had its roots in the investigation of the killing of Biggie Smalls.
articles.title: Arrest in Tupac Shakur killing stemmed from Biggie Smalls death investigation

articles.author: MARK SHERMAN
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Supreme Court is returning to a new term to take up some familiar topics — guns and abortion — and concerns about ethics swirling around the justices.
articles.title: The Supreme Court will take up abortion and gun cases in its new term while ethics concerns swirl

articles.author: CLAIRE RUSH
articles.description: A federal agency has sued the restaurant chain Chipotle, accusing it of religious harassment and retaliation after a manager at a Kansas location forcibly removed an employee's hijab, a headscarf worn by some Muslim women.
articles.title: Federal agency sues Chipotle after a Kansas manager allegedly ripped off an employee's hijab

articles.author: BRITTANY PETERSON and MICHAEL PHILLIS
articles.description: Hours before devastating fires scorched the historic town of Lahaina on Maui, Kyle Ellison labored to save his rental house in Kula, a rural mountain town 24 miles away, from a different blaze.
articles.title: When Kula needed water to stop wildfire, it got a trickle. Many other US cities are also vulnerable

articles.author: MARK THIESSEN
articles.description: Footage from deep in the Pacific Ocean has given the first detailed look at three World War II aircraft carriers that sank in the pivotal Battle of Midway and could help solve mysteries about the days-long barrage that marked a shift in control of the Pacific theater from Japanese to U.S.
articles.title: Video provides first clear views of WWII aircraft carriers lost in the pivotal Battle of Midway
